Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the corpse of a ghost spider matriarch

A felled 300 pound white spider with ten long, sturdy legs sprawled out on the cave floor. Seven eyes caught in a startled stare adorn the underside of its bulging belly, and four razor-sharp fangs protrude from an oddly-positioned mouth overhead. You can grab a sheet of carapace from its body, pluck some of the spidersilk from its stomach, and collect the dark substance on its fangs.
